items.title: Logitech’s white G502 X Plus wireless gaming mouse with RGB hits one of its lowest prices at $120
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops Logitech’s G502 X Plus wireless gaming mouse in white down to $119.99 shipped. Don’t forget to clip the on-page coupon to see the discounted price during checkout. This is regularly a $180 unit that has been holding close to full price recently, aside from a few dips into the $130 to $140 range. By clipping the on-page coupon, however, you can shave a solid $60 off its usual going rate, landing it within $5 of the lowest price we’ve tracked for this model in white. You can also get this in black, though it’s currently going for $129.99 shipped with a relatively lighter discount. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Gemini 3 Pro is integrated into the Gemini app, which now has 650M MAUs, and powers Google Search's AI Mode conversational search feature (New York Times)
items.summary:
New York Times:
Gemini 3 Pro is integrated into the Gemini app, which now has 650M MAUs, and powers Google Search's AI Mode conversational search feature  —  After several years of criticism that it was lagging behind in artificial intelligence, Google is turning up its competition with smaller start-ups like OpenAI and Anthropic.

items.title: Google announces Gemini 3, its "most intelligent" and "factually accurate" model yet, with improvements across coding, reasoning, and less "flattery" (Emma Roth/The Verge)
items.summary:
Emma Roth / The Verge:
Google announces Gemini 3, its “most intelligent” and “factually accurate” model yet, with improvements across coding, reasoning, and less “flattery”  —  The flagship Gemini 3 Pro model is coming to the Gemini app and Search, with improvements across coding, reasoning, and less ‘flattery.’

items.title: Hank Green’s Focus Friend is Google Play’s app of the year
items.summary: In a year that again saw AI assistants and tools climb the app store charts over and over, it's interesting to see a timer that helps you disconnect from your tech winning Google's highest app award.

items.title: Microsoft is turning Windows into an ‘agentic OS,’ starting with the taskbar
items.summary: Microsoft is trying to transform Windows into a “canvas for AI,” with new AI agents integrated into the Windows 11 taskbar. These new taskbar capabilities are designed to make AI agents feel like an assistant in Windows that can go off and control your PC and do tasks for you at the click of a […]

items.title: Google launches Gemini 3 with new coding app and record benchmark scores
items.summary: Google released Gemini 3, its latest and most advanced foundation model, to be made immediately available through the Gemini app and AI search interface.

items.title: Microsoft Agent 365 lets businesses manage AI agents like they do people
items.summary: Microsoft is racing towards building an AI “agent factory” that lets businesses build and manage their own AI agents. While Microsoft was founded on the idea of being a software factory, it’s quickly being transformed into an era where AI agents will increasingly take on more human work. Now, Microsoft is launching Agent 365 as […]

items.title: Microsoft’s Office apps are getting even more free AI features
items.summary: Microsoft is adding even more AI features to Outlook, Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. While the software maker has been adding plenty of features to its paid Microsoft 365 Copilot over the past year, a range of free additions are coming to its Office apps in early 2026 that don’t require the $30 per month, per […]

items.title: Google Antigravity is an ‘agent-first’ coding tool built for Gemini 3
items.summary: Alongside today’s announcement of Gemini 3 Pro, Google has revealed Antigravity, a development tool that uses Gemini 3 Pro, along with other third-party models. Google says that Antigravity, which supports multiple agents and gives them direct access to the editor, terminal, and browser, is designed for an “agent-first future.” One of the key components of […]

items.title: The Analogue 3D is the perfect console for N64 collectors
items.summary: I've developed a sixth sense for old video game cartridges. I can spot them at flea markets and thrift stores, spy them hidden behind stacks in used book stores. It happened after I first bought an Analogue Pocket, when the hunt for new and interesting Game Boy games became as important as actually playing them. […]

items.title: Google is launching Gemini 3, its ‘most intelligent’ AI model yet
items.summary: Google is beginning to launch Gemini 3 today, a new series of models the company says is its “most intelligent” and “factually accurate” AI systems yet. They’re also a chance for Google to leap ahead of OpenAI following the rocky launch of GPT-5, potentially putting the company at the forefront of consumer-focused AI models. For […]

items.title: It’s back (again): All 2025 M4 MacBook Air models are $250 off again – arguably the best Black Friday deal yet
items.summary:
Update 11/18: Just about all of the delas are now live once again after (mostly) going out of stock the last few days.

Early last week, right at the top of the month, one of the best and most notable Apple deals of the year went live – $250 price drops across the 2025 M4 MacBook Air lineup. Those Amazon all-time low prices sadly disappeared, jumping back up closer to full price on most configurations over the last few days, but they are back!

items.summary: The Indian edtech startup ended its first day as a public company on a high, with its shares closing 44% higher than they were listed for, indicating that the country's edtech sector may still recover after years of gloom.

items.summary:
Samsung’s early Black Friday sale has been live for a few days now, and the brand has just updated its lineup of offers to roll out some new deals. In addition to markdowns on Galaxy phones, tablets, and TVs, you can now save up to a whopping $1,000 on its Odyssey gaming and Smart Monitors, with deals starting as low as $170. Most – if not all monitors included in the sale – come with an additional $50 off instant upgrade credit to deliver additional savings. You’ll find all the offers waiting for you right here on this landing page, and we’ve highlighted some of our favorite picks below the fold for you to scope out.

Amazon is offering the Greenworks 80V 700 CFM Cordless Leaf Blower with 2.5Ah battery at $174.99 shipped. Dropped down from its usual $250 full price, we only saw it dipping to $200 up until July, when discounts grew and we saw more savings. While it did go as low as $165 during last month’s Prime Day event, you’re still looking at a solid 30% markdown here, cutting $75 off the going rate for the third-lowest price we have tracked – just $10 above the one-time low.

items.title: Syria opens first trial over coastal violence after Assad's fall
items.summary: ALEPPO, Syria/AMMAN (Reuters) -Syria on Tuesday began the first trial of suspects in a wave of bloodshed in March during which pro-government fighters killed hundreds of members of the Alawite minority - a case seen as a test of President Ahmed al-Sharaa's promise of accountability. items.title: Score a Switch 2-compatible Express microSD this Black Friday w/ TEAMGROUP’s 800MB/s cards from just $36 (Up to 44% off)
items.summary:
Courtesy of TEAMGROUP’s official Amazon storefront, you can now score its latest 128GB Switch 2-compatible Apex Express microSD card for $35.99 shipped. This unit normally sells for $48, but it’s now seeing a 25% markdown. Today’s deal shaves $12 off its usual going rate, landing it $4 below its previous all-time low and our mention from a couple of months back. The Apex Express microSD is available in capacities ranging from 128GB to 1TB, and they’re all discounted right now with up to 44% off. The Switch 2-compatible Express microSD cards, as you probably already know, are almost always sold out – let alone discounted – so you might want to jump in now to snag these if you’ve been planning a storage upgrade for your Switch 2 before the holidays. Head below for more details.

Regularly $150, this 1TB expansion card is now seeing a straight-up $50 discount. Only once before today have we seen this Xbox storage drop below today’s discounted price, and it’s now within just $1 of that. This also happens to be the lowest we have seen it fetch this year, landing $10 below its previous 2025 low and making this a great time to cash in. You can also get this in 512GB and 2TB variants, and they’re both at $79.99 and $249.99 shipped right now. Head below for more details.
